title: [BUG] CostBasedOptimizer tests fail with Spark 3.2.0
body:
**Describe the bug**

There are several CBO scala tests that fail when run against Spark 3.2.0 and these will be ignored in the test suite when https://github.com/NVIDIA/spark-rapids/pull/3527 is merged. This issue is to investigate and update these tests.

```
- Avoid transition to GPU for trivial projection after CPU SMJ *** FAILED ***
  0 did not equal 1 (CostBasedOptimizerSuite.scala:113)
- Force section of plan back onto CPU, AQE on *** FAILED ***
  4.068715497851372E-7 was not greater than 1.1789302031199138E-6 (CostBasedOptimizerSuite.scala:165)
- Force last section of plan back onto CPU, AQE on *** FAILED ***
  AdaptiveSparkPlan isFinalPlan=true
  +- == Final Plan ==
     LocalTableScan <empty>, [more_strings_2#219, more_strings_1#205]
  +- == Initial Plan ==
     Sort [more_strings_1#205 ASC NULLS FIRST], true, 0
     +- Exchange rangepartitioning(more_strings_1#205 ASC NULLS FIRST, 200), ENSURE_REQUIREMENTS, [id=#1400]
        +- Project [more_strings_2#219, more_strings_1#205]
           +- BroadcastHashJoin [strings#201], [strings#215], Inner, BuildRight, (cast(more_strings_2#219 as timestamp) < cast(more_strings_1#205 as timestamp)), false
              :- Project [strings#201, more_strings#202 AS more_strings_1#205]
              :  +- Exchange RoundRobinPartitioning(2), REPARTITION_BY_NUM, [id=#1387]
              :     +- LocalTableScan [strings#201, more_strings#202]
              +- BroadcastExchange HashedRelationBroadcastMode(List(input[0, string, true]),false), [id=#1396]
                 +- Project [strings#215, more_strings#216 AS more_strings_2#219]
                    +- Exchange RoundRobinPartitioning(2), REPARTITION_BY_NUM, [id=#1390]
                       +- LocalTableScan [strings#215, more_strings#216]
   was not instance of org.apache.spark.sql.execution.SortExec (CostBasedOptimizerSuite.scala:271)
```

**Steps/Code to reproduce bug**
Enable the above tests and run tests with Spark 3.2.0

**Expected behavior**
None

**Additional context**
None
